store_item.name: Drake's Mystery Treasure Jackpot
store_item.desc: Cycling Jackpot

store_item.name: Cycling Item
store_item.desc: Gives the displayed item. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Item that can be purchased with gold and cycles every 24 hours! Requires VIP Level 1.

store_item.name: Cycling Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Epic or Legendary card that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours! Requires VIP Level 5.

store_item.name: Cycling Rune
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed rune. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Rare or Epic rune that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours! Requires VIP Level 9.

store_item.name: Cycling Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Epic or Legendary card that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours! Requires VIP Level 13.

store_item.name: Cycling Reward Card
store_item.desc: Gives a single copy of the displayed Reward card. May be purchased multiple times, but the price increases each purchase!
store_item.preview_desc: Unlocks a random Epic Reward card that can be purchased with shards and cycles every 24 hours! Requires VIP Level 1.

store_item.name: Energy Bundle
store_item.desc: Fifteen Energy Potion +20 for 100 Shards for a limited time only! May be purchased 5 times!

store_item.name: Legendary Dragonstone Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes one Legendary Dragon card and three additional Epic or higher Dragon cards from Premium set! May be purchased three times!

store_item.name: Dragon Epic Pack Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 1500 gold, one Bounty Refill +5, one Energy Potion +20, and one Epic+ Dragon card and two Rare+ cards from Standard or Premium set! May be purchased three times!

store_item.name: Double Epic Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes two Standard Set ^c0DFFEpic Packs^cFFFF, 100 Arcane Dust, one Energy Potion +20, and 500 Gold! May be purchased five times!

store_item.name: Inscription Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 30 Inscription Powder, two Runecrafter's Pouch, and 1000 gold! May be purchased five times!

store_item.name: Quadra Dragon Bundle
store_item.desc: Gives four copies of one Epic+ Dragon card from Standard or Premium set. Also includes two Bounty Refills +10, two Energy Potions +20, and one random Rare+ Rune. May only be purchased once.

store_item.name: Aether Faction Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 1500 gold, one Bounty Refill +5, one Energy Potion +20, and three Standard Aether cards, 1 Epic and 2 Rares or higher! May be purchased once.

store_item.name: Chaos Faction Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 1500 gold, one Bounty Refill +5, one Energy Potion +20, and three Standard Chaos cards, 1 Epic and 2 Rares or higher! May be purchased once.

store_item.name: Wyld Faction Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 1500 gold, one Bounty Refill +5, one Energy Potion +20, and three Standard Wyld cards, 1 Epic and 2 Rares or higher! May be purchased once.

store_item.name: Dust Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 220 Arcane Dust, 1000 Gold and three Energy Potion +5. May be purchased five times!

store_item.name: Insect Epic Pack Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 1500 gold, one Bounty Refill +5, one Energy Potion +20, and one Epic+ Insect card and two Rare+ Insect cards from Standard or Premium set! May be purchased three times!

store_item.name: Quadra Insect Bundle
store_item.desc: Gives four copies of one Epic+ Insect card from Premium set. Also includes two Bounty Refills +10, two Energy Potions +20, and one random Rare+ Rune. May be purchased twice!

store_item.name: Dust Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes 220 Arcane Dust, 1000 Gold and three Energy Potion +5. May be purchased five times!

store_item.name: Epic Runecrafter's Bundle
store_item.desc: Included one ^c0DFFEpic Runeshell^cFFFF, one Runecrafter's Chest, two Energy Potion +20, and 1500 gold! May be purchased three times!

store_item.name: Legendary Insectstone Bundle
store_item.desc: Includes one ^cE7FFLegendary ^cFFFFInsect card and three additional ^c0DFFEpic^cFFFF+ Insect cards from Premium set! May be purchased 10 times!

store_item.name: Chest of Bounty
